article_title: Louis C.K. on being a dad: “It won’t take away your manhood, it will give it to you”
article_text:
Topics: dads, Father's Day, Fatherhood, Gender, Louis CK, men, moms, Parenting, parents, Video, Life News, News

It’s Father’s Day, everyone. Here’s Louis C.K. on why being a dad (or being a parent or caretaker in general) means being imperfect and figuring things out as you go, and why that’s totally OK.

“I make a lot of mistakes. I don’t know what I’m doing,” the comedian observed in 2010. “But my kids love me. Go figure.”
